text: Bandannas, Tattoos & Tongue Rings is a studio album released by rapper Messy Marv on January 25, 2005. Guest appearances on the album include Lil' Flip (credited as Clover Geez), Suga Free, Rich The Factor, Dead Prez, Guce, E-40 & Yukmouth. It peaked at number 80 on the Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums.[ ((( Bandannas, Tattoos & Tongue Rings > Charts & Awards > Billboard Albums )))]. All Media Guide, LLC. title: Bandannas, Tattoos & Tongue Rings
